Key Match Events: Corbin Carroll hit a go-ahead grand slam in the 8th inning
Pete Alonso flew out on the first pitch in the 9th inning
J.D. Martinez struck out in the 9th inning
Jesse Winker grounded out to end the game in the 9th inning
Post-Match Reflections: Mets closer Edwin Diaz allowed a go-ahead grand slam as New York fell, 8-5, to the Diamondbacks
The Mets (69-64) are now 4.0 games behind the Braves after Atlanta won earlier in the evening
Miscellaneous Highlights: Corbin Carroll's two home runs accounted for five of Arizona's eight runs
The Mets scored five unanswered runs after Luis Severino's sluggish start
Others: Luis Severino pitched 4.2 innings, allowing four runs on eight hits and one walk while striking out nine
Eduardo Rodriguez was perfect through four innings
The Mets and Diamondbacks complete their three-game series on Thursday afternoon
